Channel.Message: This is the Analytic channel to which internal Analytic events from the HIDCLASS driver are sent.

Event.Channel: This is the Analytic channel to which internal Analytic events from the HIDCLASS driver are sent.
This is the Analytic channel to which internal Analytic events from the HIDCLASS driver are sent.
This is the Analytic channel to which internal Analytic events from the HIDCLASS driver are sent.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="VendorID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ProductID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="VersionNumber" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportDescriptorLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ReportDescriptor" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="ReportDescriptorLength"/> </template>

Event.Channel: This is the Analytic channel to which internal Analytic events from the HIDCLASS driver are sent.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PhysicalDeviceObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="VendorID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ProductID" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="VersionNumber" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="DeviceInstancePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceServiceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceUpperFilters" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceLowerFilters" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CollectionCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReportDescriptorLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ReportDescriptor" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="ReportDescriptorLength"/> <data name="DevicePowerState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StateMachineCurrentState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OpenCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LastReadReportSuccessTime" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="NumReadReports" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSinceStart" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSincePresence" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSinceD0" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSinceCaptureState" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <struct name="Collections" count="CollectionCount"> <data name="CollectionNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UsagePage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Usage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="OpenCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LastReadReportTime" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="NumReadReports" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSinceStart" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSincePresence" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSinceD0" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSinceOpenForRead" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NumReadReportsSinceCaptureState" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </struct> </template>
